title: Christina Aguilera makes a grand entrance in a ruffle dress at the amfAR Gala
text:
She was the evening's scheduled guest performer.

And Christina Aguilera made her grand entrance Thursday evening at the annual amfAR gala, held at Milk Studios in LA.

The event was set to raise money for the foundation, which funds AIDS research.

All eyes on her! Christina Aguilera, 38, made her grand entrance Thursday evening at the annual amfAR gala, held at Milk Studios in LA

Christina couldn't help but stand out in sequin, black-and-red set of high waist trousers.

The 38-year-old's ensemble was fitted with a voluminous ruffle top and skirted bottom.

The mother-of-two wore her beach blonde hair in a high topknot, with pieces strategically framing her face.

Her look for the night: Christina couldn't help but stand out in sequin, black-and-red set of high waist trousers

It takes a village: The Grammy winner took to Instagram to shared behind-the-scenes clips of her glam team prepping her for the show

Keeping them up to date: 'Hey I'm at amfAR about to go on and perform tonight,' she told her followers

The Grammy winner took to Instagram to shared behind-the-scenes clips of her glam team prepping her for the show.

'Hey I'm at amfAR about to go on and perform tonight,' she told her followers.

amfAR attendee Rumer Willis captured Christina's performance from the front of the stage.

Up close and personal: amfAR attendee Rumer Willis captured Christina's performance from the front of the stage

Full: The star's ensemble was fitted with a voluminous ruffle top and skirted bottom

Standing out: Christina's eyes were highlighted with summery bronzed colors and full lashes

It has been a busy season for Christina.

In addition to her gala performance, the star was tapped to sing the song, Haunted Heart, for the new Adamms Family movie.

She also received an award from the domestic violence organization, Shade Tree. She is a proud supporter and monetary donor of the LA-based, 24 hour charity.

Autumnal look: The Latina singer sported a neutral lip and bronzed cheeks

Fall colors: Christina sported a maroon manicure, and accessorized with drop earrings
